One of the best boxes you sold, Frank was that  one Sharon had, it was a 
g=
reat, great spirit box, she used it for our  online sessions.  I really mis=
s 
that, we got lots of people talking on it,  and I was able to pull a ful=

sessions from one of the recordings, in  reverse!   I got clearly, my fu=
ll 
name, first, middle and last,  it was a very wonderful box.  Whom ever =
has it 
now, hope they appreciate  it, not sure which box it was, it may ha=

In a message dated 11/9/2011 12:01:08 P.M. Eastern Standard =
Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
Time for me to back the fu=
ck up and look in the mirror. Since day  one, one 
argument after another o=
ver the boxes, what they are for, who can use  it, 
how one jerkoff or anot=
her is the master box user and determines who can  
use the box, and always=
 somebody claims my work no good, while theirs  
superior.  I'm jumping off=
 this track, ya want it? You got it, someone  else can 
have the loonies, t=
he con men, the tricksters, the posers, and the  "ones that 
know better". =
Not getting sucked into the dark with this box crap  any 
longer, it was su=
pposed to be for my own use anyway, y'all simply  can't handle 
that level =
of spirit communication. Learned the hard way that  there is a 
reason why =
certain knowledge is withheld from the uninitiated.  I can't fix 
what I ha=
ve done, all I can do is walk away. Like the guy  said "you can't 
handle t=
he truth!" 
 
 Not gonna debate it, been there done that, no one hears or l=
istens,  
always " Oh, I know so much better" is the response. "For my rese=
arch", yeah,  
heard that about five hundred times! 
 
 Time for me to seek=
 the light side of the force--while there is  still 
time. 
 
 Frank Sumpti=
on
